Interface IProjectApplicationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectApplicationService
public interface IProjectApplicationService
Interface for managing project applications by applicants. Includes operations for applying, withdrawing, updating status, and booking BTO project units.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addApplication(String projectName, String userID, FlatType flatType)
    Adds a new project application to the system with a specified flat type.

    Launches the process for an applicant to apply for a BTO project.
    int
    bookApplication(String projectName, String userID)
    Confirms booking of a flat under a specific project for a given applicant.
    ProjectApplication
    chooseFromApplicationList(Scanner sc, List<ProjectApplication> applications)
    Allows user to select one project application from a given list.

  • Method Details

    • applyForProject

      void applyForProject(Scanner sc, Applicant user, String selectedProjectName)
      Launches the process for an applicant to apply for a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      user - The applicant submitting the application
      selectedProjectName - The name of the project being applied to

    • addApplication

      void addApplication(String projectName, String userID, FlatType flatType)
      Adds a new project application to the system with a specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      userID - The NRIC of the applicant
      flatType - The type of flat the applicant is applying for

    • withdrawApplication

      void withdrawApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Withdraws a submitted project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to be withdrawn

    • updateApplicationStatus

      void updateApplicationStatus(ProjectApplication application, ProjectAppStat newStatus)
      Updates the status of a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to update
      newStatus - The new application status to assign

    • bookApplication

      int bookApplication(String projectName, String userID)
      Confirms booking of a flat under a specific project for a given applicant.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      userID - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      1 if booking successful, 0 otherwise

    • getProjectApplications

      List<ProjectApplication> getProjectApplications(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all applications submitted for a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name
      Returns:
      List of project applications

    • chooseFromApplicationList

      ProjectApplication chooseFromApplicationList(Scanner sc, List<ProjectApplication> applications)
      Allows user to select one project application from a given list.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      applications - The list of project applications
      Returns:
      The selected project application

    • getApplicationByUserAndProject

      ProjectApplication getApplicationByUserAndProject(String userId, String projectName)
      Retrieves a specific application based on applicant ID and project name.
      Parameters:
      userId - The NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The matching project application, or null if not found
